effect.elemental_wizards_rpg.soaked.desc: Soaking the target with water extinguishing fire, more vulnerable to frost, lightning and water spells.
effect.elemental_wizards_rpg.cleansing_w: Holy water, extinguishing fire and regenerating health. If the target is full health, cleansing negative effects on applying the effect.
effect.elemental_wizards_rpg.bubble_foam: On contact protecting the player and pushing targets away.
effect.elemental_wizards_rpg.stone_flesh: Gives the user armor and armor toughness, if you have all hearts, the next attack will get reduced by 50%.
effect.elemental_wizards_rpg.trembling.d: Slows the target, when the effect amplifier is 4, the target gets stunned.
effect.elemental_wizards_rpg.aeroblast.d: Knocks the target up when applied.
effect.elemental_wizards_rpg.updraft.des: Makes the target more vulnerable to air spell damage, if its in the air and keeps the target in the air.
effect.elemental_wizards_rpg.tornado.des: Makes the target more vulnerable to fire spell damage, sucks it in the nearest tornado and knocks the target up.
Heals you for {heal} or splashes the target dealing {damage} water spell damage.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.aqua_water_w: Fast water whip, dealing {damage} water spell damage, soaking the target.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.aqua_bubble_: Spawning small bubbles, dealing {damage} water spell damage on targets, protecting friends.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.aqua_springw: Summoning water springs, healing and cleansing friends by {heal}, and dealing {damage} water spell damage to targets.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.aqua_hydro_b: Channeling a high hydro-pressure beam, dealing {damage} water damage every second and soaking targets.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.terra_stone_: Projectile dealing {damage} earth spell damage, exploding on contact damaging nearby targets.
Projectile dealing {damage} earth spell damage and inflicting bleeding, exploding on contact damaging nearby targets.
Increases armor and armor toughness, if you have all hearts, the next attack will deal half the damage.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.terra_drip_c: Spawning two dripstone circles, dealing {damage} earth spell damage and adding bleeding.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.terra_earthq: Dealing {damage} earth spell damage, throwing targets around and adding Trembling effect.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.wind_gust.de: Small gust dealing {damage} air spell damage.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.wind_air_cut: Dealing constant {damage} air spell damage in a small area.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.wind_aerobla: Air blast, dealing {damage} air spell damage and knocking the target up.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.wind_updraft: Damaging the target constantly with {damage} air spell damage, dealing more damage when the target is in the air.
spell.elemental_wizards_rpg.wind_tornado: Summoning a tornado, dealing {damage} air spell damage, knocking enemies up and sucking them in the tornado.
advancements.rpg_classes.air_rune.title: Path of Air
